mapper.select: SELECT user.id, user.user_name, user.password, user.email, user.area, user.nation, user.purpose, sns.twitter, sns.instagram, sns.facebook FROM mst_user AS user JOIN mst_user_sns AS sns ON user.id = sns.user_id WHERE user.user_name = #{userName} AND user.password = #{password}
